syllabus.description:
Upload your photo here by clicking the insert image button (2nd button from left) in the toolbar and dragging in your photo.

Insert your name here

Course: Your course number and name.

Email: Your email address.

Phone: Your phone number.

Virtual Office: Your virtual office https://byui.adobeconnect.com/....

Office hours: Your virtual office hours.

Welcome to COURSE 101 - Title of the Course

About The Course

Write a brief paragraph or two that describes the purpose of the course. Introduce the benefits of the course and any interesting topics to be covered. Help students see how you hope they will still see the world differently or still use the skills they learn in this course five years from now. Provide any over-arching tips you may have to help students gain the most from the course.

How to Get Started

The first thing you will need to do is study the following links to meet your instructor and familiarize yourself with the course and learning management system:

  • Course Syllabus
  • Class Schedule
  • I-Learn Tour
